author: PFCal-dev
body:
* New floating point compression in the Very Front-end
* New "Super Cell" algorithm in the Concentrator
* New clustering algorithm in the Back-end, based on histogram seeding
* Updated python customisation functions
* Implementation of residual comments in #24544 (`thickness` function in trigger tools, and switch to `unordered_maps`)
* Fix of the V9 geometry mappings

Depends on external cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#10
title: [HGCAL trigger] New algorithms + fixes
